entry.title: Photos Post 29: Special Events (after 1975), Part 04
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 2 Photos of the special event have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 2 high resolutions from the Named Collections.
The direct link to the 2 Photos in the smallest gallery: Australia 1991.
Please kindly share the links with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam

entry.title: Photos Post 30: Updates
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We would like to bring to your attention that the Lotus Feet galleries are up to date. Grouped chronologically, they form 32 galleries of the folder Permanent Displays.
Please keep in mind that, as the CCT database is monthly organized, in due time some of these galleries will be divided into 2 or more galleries.
Please kindly share the news and the folder's link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam

entry.title: Photos Post 13: Moments of Growth, New Albums and Galleries, Part 12

link.title: Photos Post 13: Moments of Growth, New Albums and Galleries, Part 12

entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to bring to your attention 1 new art gallery Enlightened Poems Framed and 1 new Subfolder Palazzo Doria 1997 Fall of the Folder Shri Mataji's Places; this subfolder currently has 1 thematic gallery Dogs.
Please kindly share the news and the links with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam

entry.title: Photos Post 28: First Annual Report Moments of Growth

link.title: Photos Post 28: First Annual Report Moments of Growth

entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The website Jai Shri Mataji or Sahaja Image Events has now 3,312 images. Since CCT has started uploading images to it on February 1, 2023, 1,202 images have been uploaded. We aim to continue uploading (as an average) 100 images per month.
In particular, below are the 12 new galleries which have been started in the last 12 months and which already have at least 24 images.
1. Books of Edward Saugstad: has 50 images.
2. Awards, Diplomas and Recognitions: has 57 images.
3. Gifts and Offerings: has 29 images.
4. India Tours by Colin Heinsen: has 133 images.
5. India Tours by Jo Băjescu: has 219 images.
6. Publications-Offerings: has 32 images.
7. Puja Seminars: has 75 images.
8. Personalities Paintings: has 24 images.
9. Personalities Photos: has 133 images.
10. ISPS: has 28 images.
11. Palazzo Doria by John Watkinson: has 26 images.
12. Śhuddy Camp by Colin Heinsen: has 204 images.
Please kindly share the news and the links with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam
